content: MQN Push button Electro-galvanized channel connector for joining any modular support elements with a butterfly opening ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Designed to be simple, compact and time-saving Holds securely once pressed, turned and tightened correctly Single-part fastener replaces a spring nut, bolt and washer for quick installation Applications Connecting angles to strut channels Connection element for trapeze and cross-beam structures Connecting strut channels and structural elements Recommended for use in dry, interior environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Thread connection - M: M10 Material composition: Bolt: M10 grade 8.8 - DIN ISO 898, Nut: C4C - DIN EN 10263, Plate: S235JR - DIN EN 10025 Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Thread connection - M | M10 | Material composition | Bolt: M10 grade 8.8 - DIN ISO 898, Nut: C4C - DIN EN 10263, Plate: S235JR - DIN EN 10025 | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) | Wrench size | 11/16 in | Weight | 0.14 lb ### ITEMS- 2302707 - Pushbutton MQN - Package Size 50 pc
